ModMetaData.name: Sake Brewery
ModMetaData.author: Match
ModMetaData.description:
This mod is an addition to Vanilla Expanded Brewing. It adds sake and the means to produce it in the exact same way. The sake blends in with all the other beverages.
With every drink you also gain a bit of psyfocus and a small buff to mental break threshold.
This is a continuation of the mod Sake Brewery (Unofficial VE Brewing Addon) and developed with the permission of Sovereign
